body.p:
Mayfield Ky Nov. 13th 1863
His Excellency
Governor Bramlete
Frankfort Ky.
Dr Sir.

At the last May term of our Circuit court there was a Judgment rendered against M D Morgan, on a forfeited Bail Bond for five Hundred Dollars (500.00) He is an honest hard-working man in only moderate circumstances and if he is compelled to pay the whole amount of said Judgment it will work a great hardship on him and his family. Therefore we hope you will use the power vested in you, in his favor and remit the fine or as much there of as you can consistently with your duty to the Commonwealth.

Yours Very Respectfully
W A Turner
Clerk Circuit Court
T. J. Puryeur Sheriff G.C
Wm Bradley
W G. Blount
Judge
R A Mayes
Co Atty for Graves County

Refused
Tho E Bramlette
Graves County
Ansd
5th Dec /63
